# Web Toothbrush Inspector - AI Coding Agent Instructions

## Project Overview
A browser-based Web Bluetooth dashboard for reverse-engineering Philips Sonicare toothbrushes. Single-page application using vanilla JavaScript with Three.js (3D visualization), Chart.js (sensor graphs), and Tailwind CSS.

**No build system** - runs directly in browser via CDN dependencies. No package.json, npm, or bundler.


## Commit Message Guidelines
* Use the Conventional Commits format: `<type>(<scope>): <subject>`
